title: Copperwire

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Consume any amount of players' Strikes tonight, and select a player to attack for each Strike consumed. If you used at least four, you'll raise your attack by a tier permanently, roleblock your targets and fail the visits of those who would attempt to visit you tonight.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you're visited by a non-Thundercry, generate an extra Strike.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain Basic defense.

*The rusted clangor serves as a warning; stay home.*
